product_name: SmartWool NTS 195 Lightweight Long Underwear Bottoms - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Camping or hiking in cold weather? The women's SmartWool NTS 195 Lightweight Long Underwear Bottoms will keep you warm and comfortable, thanks to soft, breathable merino wool. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Lightweight bottoms feature a combination of jersey and rib knit; special threads at bottom hems increase durability. Logo elastic waistband has soft wool-terry lining next to skin; crotch gusset is clean finished and chafe free. Lightweight bottoms fall between microweight and midweight in the Smartwool next-to-skin (NTS) base layer weights. The SmartWool NTS 195 Lightweight Long Underwear Bottoms do not itch and will not shrink; machine wash and dry. Closeout.
